title: Kaatriley Nadanthene Lyrics Aadhi Bhagavan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kaatriley Nadanthene
Singers: Udit Narayan, Shwetha Pandit
Movie: Aadhi Bhagavan
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics : Arivumathi


Kaatriley Nadanthene,
Kadhalai alandheney
nee thoda parandhene
naan ennai viyandhene

ayyo ayyo megam pola
kalaidhu kalaindhu pogiren
meiyyo poiyyo thonavillai
rasigan kavigan aaginen
vinmeen mudhugil aerinen
nooru kandam thaavinen
unnil unnil muzhginen  â€¦..Kaatriley Nadanthene

Uyire uyire rendaanadhe oh,,
illamai udaindhu thindaadhudhe.ye oh ..
paarai karaindhu paalaanadhe
paarvai naangum kondaadudhe

vaanam endhan thalai thattudhe
vaarthai ennil kavi kattudhe
neeyum naanum ketkaamal naam aanadhaen

Moochu kaatrile nuzhaindhaaye
moochu pootukal thirandhaaye
nee yaaradaa, thaedinen mugavarithaaney

vaai koosudhey un peraithaan pesudhey
saaralil naan kaaikiren
unvizhi kudaithaana !!
Oomayaai naan thaeikiren
un mozhi vidaithaana!!!

Rasika kaviyai naadinen
unnil unnil moozhginen
minnal mudhugil aeriye
naanum kandam thaavinen

Kaatriley Nadanthene,
Kadhalai alandheney
nee thoda parandhene
naan ennai viyandhene
